definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Please complete registration form below and turn into your teacher or PTA .
sentences.chinese: 請詳細填寫報名表後交給班級老師或家長會。

sentences.english: School Administration and Parent Council will fully support a teacher's work.
sentences.chinese: 校委會和家長會將全力協助，支持老師工作。

sentences.english: Here, suggestions to maximize the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 下面，我給您提出一些使家長會充分發揮作用的建議。

sentences.english: Eight. Duing the parents' meeting, the vice headmaster told us an interesting things.
sentences.chinese: 在家長會上，副校長告訴了我們一件有趣的事。

sentences.english: Please notify PTA immediately if you cannot perform the Parents on Duty due to schedule conflicts and any other problems.
sentences.chinese: 若預定值日時間無法當值，請立即告之家長會。

sentences.english: Vue interprets for parents like Chee Xiong during parent-teacher conferences.
sentences.chinese: 憂爲熊澈這樣的家長在家長會上做翻譯。

sentences.english: For example, a great number of parents will send their children to dance class.
sentences.chinese: 例如，許多家長會送自己的小孩子去學舞蹈。

sentences.english: All parents meetings at SCIE adopt the same format and procedure.
sentences.chinese: 我校所有的家長會都採用同樣的形式和程序。

sentences.english: Account balance will be transferred to the next PTA chair at the end of school year.
sentences.chinese: 學年度結束時所餘款項移交下一任家長會會長。

sentences.english: I have parent meetings and call the parents and schoolteachers to motivate them to child friendly education.
sentences.chinese: 我在家長會上呼籲家長和老師對孩子進行友好教育。

sentences.english: A little boy invited his mother to attend his elementary schools first teacher-parent conference .
sentences.chinese: 有個小男孩邀請他的母親去參加學校舉辦的次家長會。

sentences.english: It is hard to imagine parents teaching five-month-old babies much about politics or religion.
sentences.chinese: 難以想象家長會向五個月的孩子灌輸政治和宗教觀念。

sentences.english: I joined the boards of my son's new school and other local organizations.
sentences.chinese: 我加入了兒子學校的家長會和其他的社區組織。

sentences.english: We're going to meet the teacher at the parent-teacher conferenece.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在家長會和老師見面。

sentences.english: The Nacirema believe that parents bewitch their own children.
sentences.chinese: 加利美阿人相信家長會詛咒他們的孩子，尤其是母親。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
pediatrics/pediatric (department)/sth of little importance/trifle/a child's play/(slang) childish/petty/stingy
to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
(Tw) medical checkup/physical examination (abbr. for 健康檢查|健康检查[jian4 kang1 jian3 cha2])
to enter the venue/to enter the arena/(aviation) to approach the airfield/(investing) to get into the market
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
